findings.rationale: The five-year duration may be insufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially leading to unintentional disclosures after the agreement's expiration.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting bond may expose the Receiving Party to immediate and potentially unjust restrictions without any financial safeguard.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment of the agreement could hinder flexibility for either party in the event of a merger or acquisition, potentially limiting business operations.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
